column5: Hey guys, Me and my friends are looking to plan an ice fishing trip and need some suggestions on where to head. Looking for a hut rental that will comfortably fit 4 people. We are looking for a place somewhere within an hour and a half of Hamilton, and most the guys do not care too much about what species just as long as there is fish to catch lol! Looking to spend no more than $50 a person, Thanks

The only places I can think of within 1.5 hours would be Gilford on Simcoe  or Island Lake in Orangeville.  https://www.google.com/maps/d/viewer?oe=UTF8&t=m&ie=UTF8&msa=0&mid=zrxIUdIkvzRw.kpa7eQLd0UmE  There are also hut operators at Long Point on Lake Erie, but I have never been.
